description:
Redtail Paddles, based in Ontario, is famous as a quality paddle maker. This is one of their most beautiful and functional paddles – it’s made from beautiful black walnut with a single strip of cherry down the center and inserts in the blade.

  • Shaft is black walnut and cherry
  • Black walnut blade with cherry inserts
  • Curved euro grip helps prevent wrist and arm fatigue
  • Resin tip adds strength and protection
name: Redtail Bellski Premium Canoe Paddle
